name: Astronoma
description:
Controls

A/D - Turn left/right

W/S - Increase/Decrease thruster power

R - Restart level when exploded

Space - Next level when landed

Esc - Pause/Unpause Game

Ctrl+Alt+C - Enable chromatic aberration post-processing (not recommended, slows down the game)

Ctrl+Alt+B - Enable bloom post-processing (not recommended, slows down the game)

Game Description

A reimagination of what the classic 1979 Atari's game called Lunar Lander would be like in the moddern days

Astronoma was made to bring Lunar Lander's core mechanics, land in a planet, control the fuel lose rate and land in the platforms with highest score. But with extra features:

-Colorful design;

-Smooth controls;

-Variety of terrain types, from something like earth to a hot full of magma planet;

-Wind to make things harder;

-And extra game's graphics.

This game is a prototype, so there's much to do with performance, gameplay, etc. Any feedback is appreciated!
